name: Arc-en-ciel Passion
text: You can Special Summon this card from your hand if you control a Fire Warrior monster. When you activate a "Dream Prism" this card gains 500 ATK. Once per turn: if this card has 3000 or more ATK; you can add 1 "Arc-en-ciel" card from your Deck to your hand. You can only Special Summon 1 "Arc-en-ciel Passion" once per turn.
